attributes.action: Limit the use of under age free bus travel in London to school times only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: School children are able to travel on busses at any time although Pensioners can only travel after 9.30, if there is a limit on Pensioners because I am told they will have no need to travel before this time. Then a limit should be added to under age travellers as they will have no school appointments after 4.30pm
